      public void useTool(Tile tile, Player player, int currentDay)
      The use tool override allows the shovel to add experience and shovel the withered crop in the tile.
      Overrides:
      useTool in class Tools
      Parameters:
      tile - the tile that is going to be fertilized
      player - the player class that gains experience
      currentDay - the current day count
